title: City centre developments (TEFC)
creator_credit: Graeme Turner, Open University, BBC-TV and Alberta Educational Commission Corp
brief_description: Looks at capitalist Vancouver, mixed economy Birmingham and socialist Cracow, noting the influences which cause city centres to change in character, function and population.
